normalised: Basically, imagine a learning system that changes the difficulty based on how *you* are doing. Like, if you're acing the calculus problems, it throws in harder ones. But if you're struggling with trigonometry, it gives you more practice problems and maybe even some Khan Academy-style videos to re-learn the basics. Sounds pretty cool, right?
